alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; East Central Plains; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued February 25 at 5:58AM MST until February 26 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR MUCH OF EASTERN NEW MEXICO DUE TO VERY STRONG WINDS... .A vigorous storm system and associated cold front will sweep from west to east over northern and central New Mexico Sunday. Very strong to damaging downslope winds may result in drier humidities than predicted with fine fuels supportive of carrying fire. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * AREA AND TIMING...Northeast Plains (zone 104), East Central Plains (zone 126), Northeast Highlands (zone 123) and Central Highlands (zone 125). * 20 FOOT WINDS...Southwest 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 60 to 70 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Around 20 to 25 percent although very strong winds are expected to result in lower humidities. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; East Central Plains; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains
